title: Mario Interview
itunes:title: Mario Interview
description:
Mario stops through to discuss leaving J Records his longtime label, starting a new media company, how his relationship with his mother is progressing and much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
